item.title: Change Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: Jekyll had some issue with MD to HTML parser, so we found other static site generator. We considered Hugo and Gatsby, but decided to go with Hugo. There are several reasons why. faster simple less dependency (less plugins though) Template is cleaned and Young made it as Hugo-theme. Bear-exporter (it is named as Pizzly now ðŸ¤©) is also applied all differences. Gatsby looks great but seems much similar to Wordpress.

item.title: Inspiration
item.description: Today I read a blog post about success story of self taught. There are a lot of similar stories about being developer, but as mentioned in the post, most of them are mostly focused on the web development and saying about the good courses or useful materials. â€ƒHowever, for me, Iâ€™m gonna focusing on the computer graphics and algorithms, so I just wondered if there are similar cases. This is a one of the case and itâ€™s very impressive as she studied lots of courses Iâ€™m planning to do.
